entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (quest_u10_lucien_bender.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_29: My sons...why have you abandoned me??!!
entries.s_31: That's right...my sons. They ran away long, long ago. But this time I'll treat them better. I won't ignore them or run any more experiments on them. If only they would return to me.
entries.s_38: You ran experiments on your sons?
entries.s_39: No! Maybe. I needed test subjects. My work was important. And who are you to judge me! You're as bad as that Meatlump King who stole my boys away from me!! I may not be able to get to him, but I can teach you to keep my boys from me!
entries.s_8: Louis? Hraykken? Draykken? No, you are not one of my sons. Begone!
